products.title: Day & Night Flecked White
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, white - day night blind using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on y
products.productdescription: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs.Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Luna Softshade Pure White Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Luna softshade pure white day and night blind in white. Made to measure from 28.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Brighten up your windows with this smart and versatile day and night roller blind. The luna softshade pure white day and night roller blind boasts an adjustable design that is great for bringing calm and seclusion to any space whilst allowing plenty of natural light to filter through. Made using strips of white polyester and voile fabric, this versatile blind is ideal for downstairs, street facing rooms.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1864 fabric colour: pure white material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Vogue, White - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Vogue, white - day night blind the sharp, icy hue of the vogue in white gives a clean and fresh look, and the sleekness of the fabric does nothing to contradict it. With its moveable translucent strips, for privacy and light control, this blind is truly t
products.productdescription: The sharp, icy hue of the vogue in white gives a clean and fresh look, and the sleekness of the fabric does nothing to contradict it. With its moveable translucent strips, for privacy and light control, this blind is truly the height of contemporary style.Team the white with a deep, dark navy blue to form a naval theme in the dining room. A navy feature wall, with the blind sat in its midst, will look simply stunning. Go for grand, dark furniture and accent with glossy, yellowy golds to finish off the look.

products.title: Nobis Softshade Ivory White Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nobis softshade ivory white day and night blind in white. Made to measure from 40.55 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Whether working, relaxing or sleeping, the nobis softshade ivory white day and night roller blind is a versatile choice for convenient light control in any room. Additionally, the attractive design in ivory white will suit a range of interior styles. This stylish blind features horizontal panels of quality polyester fabric and voile to offer both privacy and a soft light filtration to keep your space feeling open and bright.

products.title: Mero Softshade Soft White Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Mero softshade soft white day and night blind in white. Made to measure from 46.27 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
For a bright and airy feel to your space, opt for the mero softshade soft white day and night roller blind. This practical window blind uses a stylish and functional design that offers various levels of shading to suit your requirements for your space whatever time of day. This version in white fabric with voile strips is light, fresh and contemporary.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Luxa, white - vista blind every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and lig
products.productdescription: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood.Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor. Fully open in the morning as you get energised for the day ahead, or closed just right as you set the tone for a long relaxing bath at the end of the day.

products.title: Bayham, Pure White - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Bayham, pure white - vista blind to allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it
products.productdescription: To allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it offers complete control of the ambient light levels. The finely crafted voile panels serve as the perfect accompaniment for the clean glow of pure white.Keeping your decor simple yet styled is the secret to creating a contemporary home that will stay current for years to come. Pure white allows you to add a touch of understated style and works perfectly when partnered with a minimalist coffee table and monotone rug in the living room.
